file_content.text: Soon as I can fight, I get new job with less Jedi.
That fast, you really hunt Green Jedi already? I think you try to cheat me if I not know better.
Xev follow and say you make short work of Jedi, hard to believe. Sith boss be happy, I be happy. Here your pay.
Go kill Green Jedi, I not avoid Sith boss all day.
Hey, you. Come here. I need favor.
All you Imperials, right? I work for Empire. My problem your problem.
You Imperial. I work for Empire. My problem your problem.
We both merc, you know score dealing with Empire. Understand my problem.
My crew hired to hunt Green Jedi ambushing patrols in Axial Park. Well, we find Jedi--or they find us. Not sure which but things go bad.
How did things play out?
We attack Green Jedi, they small, try to get hands on them quick. Smash them before they start swinging lightsabers around. They too fast.
You think I can help somehow?
So what?
Green Jedi your enemy, you should care. Maybe you care about credits. Green Jedi worth pile of credits, that why we here in first place.
I in bad shape, half crew dead and lightsaber in guts slow me down bad. Empire not like failure, 'specially when they pay in advance.
I need Jedi dead, before Sith boss get angry and make lightsaber wound worse. I give credits Empire pay my crew, call it even. What you say?
So long as you're paying.
I'll save your miserable hide.
Rocket tram tunnels where mess start, Green Jedi use for cover then ambush, bet they still be there.
Kill them good and I give you nice pile of credits with big smile.
I say "no." [Refuse quest]
Ugh... maybe Sith boss take credits back and forget whole thing.
Ugh, got me good. Leave me 'lone, would ya?
